hand-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: X: RSP → USP; Y: Dorsal → Palmar surface at the midpoint RSP-USP; Z: MCP → midpoint RSP-USP; Ulnar Styloid Process (USP), Radial Styloid Process (RSP); Ulnar Styloid Process (USP);Third Metacarpophalangeal Joint (MCP): The knuckle of the middle finger

lower-leg-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: X: FME → FLE; Y: Popliteal Fossa → Patellar Anterior Surface; Z: midpoint FME-FLE → Greater Trochanter; Femur Medial Epicondyle (FME); Femur Lateral Epicondyle (FLE); Patellar Anterior Surface; Back of the knee (Popliteal Fossa)
